dashboard.description: Loki v2+ showcase using JSON NGINX access logs.

targets.expr: {job="$job", instance="$instance"} |= "" | json
sum(count_over_time({job="$job", instance="$instance"} |= "" | json [$__range])) by (request_host)
sum(count_over_time({job="$job", instance="$instance"} |= "" | json [1m])) by (request_host)
sum(count_over_time({job="$job", instance="$instance"} |= "" | json [$__range])) by (request_remote_ip)
{job="$job", instance="$instance"} |= "" | json
sum (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} [$__interval]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"}[$__interval])

sum(count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | status >= 500 |__error__=""[$__interval])) / (sum(count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | __error__=""[$__interval]))/ 100)

sum(count_over_time(({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} |= "Googlebot")[$__interval])) / (sum(count_over_time(({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} != "Googlebot")[$__interval])) / 100)
count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval])))
bytes_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"}[$__interval])
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

options.content:
📊 Dashboard created by Ward Bekker (hope you like it!)

🐦 Follow me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/wardbekker) & [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/wardbekker/) for  Grafana Loki updates 

🎥 Check out my [Grafana Loki video's](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDGkOdUX1UjqEzcxQrbROMy8DN7MZv_h4) on Youtube

targets.expr: sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | geoip_country_code != "" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

topk(10, sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | geoip_country_code != "" and  __error__="" [$__interval])))
{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | line_format "➡️ {{.msec}} {{.status}} \n {{.request_body}}"
quantile_over_time(0.95,{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]) by (host)
max by (host) (max_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

topk(10, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  http_referer != "" and http_referer !~ ".*?$host.*?" and http_referer !~ ".*?\\*\\*\\*.*?" | __error__="" [15m])))
topk(10, sum by (http_user_agent) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  __error__="" [15m])))
topk(10, sum by (remote_addr, geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  __error__="" [15m])))

topk(10, sum by (request_uri) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__="" [15m])))

dashboard.title: Loki - Test
